weather.question: I fall from the sky, and help flowers grow. What am I?

hints.text: ☔ You need an umbrella when I fall.

weather.question: I am big and yellow, and shine in the sky. What am I?

hints.text: 🕶️ You need sunglasses when I am very bright.

weather.question: I am white and cold and fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ You can make a snowman with me.
🧤 You need gloves when I am outside.

weather.question: I blow through the trees and move the clouds. What am I?

hints.text: 🪁 You can fly a kite when I am strong.
🌬️ I am made of air moving.

weather.question: I am gray and fluffy, and sometimes I bring rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I sometimes look like a sheep.

weather.question: I am a big storm with lots of wind and rain. What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 You should stay inside when I come.

weather.question: I am a colorful arc that appears after it rains. What am I?

hints.text: 🌦️ I appear when the sun shines after the rain.
✨ People say there's a pot of gold at the end of me.

weather.question: I am a flash of light in the sky during a storm. What am I?
I am a loud booming sound that comes after lightning. What am I?

hints.text: ⛈️ I follow a flash of light.
👂 You can hear me from far away.

weather.question: I am a big, white, fluffy form of ice that falls from the sky. What am I?

hints.text: ⚪ I am bigger than a raindrop and solid.
⚾ I can be very big and hurt if I hit you.

transport.question: I go beep beep! I have wheels and take you places. What am I?

hints.text: 🗺️ I can take you to the park!

transport.question: I float on the water. I can be big or small. What am I?

hints.text: 🐳 I am bigger than a duck.

transport.question: I go choo-choo! I ride on tracks. What am I?
I have two wheels and you pedal me. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 You use your legs to move.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people far away. What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I am bigger than a bird.

transport.question: I’m a big car that takes many people to school. What am I?

hints.text: 🛑 I have a stop sign that comes out.

transport.question: I help build things on construction sites. I have a big arm. What am I?

hints.text: 👷 I am used by construction workers.
🦺 You might see me building a house.

transport.question: I zoom through space! I take astronauts to the moon. What am I?

hints.text: 🌑 I can travel to other planets.
🔥 I make a lot of noise when I launch.

transport.question: I help people who are sick or hurt. I have a siren. What am I?

hints.text: 🤕 I take people to the hospital.

transport.question: I carry lots of things from far away across the ocean. I am very big. What am I?

hints.text: 🚢 I am much bigger than a boat.
